description:
According to Euphoria actor Hunter Schafer, requiring the correct sex on one’s passport is another way for the Trump Administration to erase trans people. However, given that this policy is nothing more than a national commitment to truth, his concerns are not what you would call “logical.”

‘Euphoria’ star Hunter Schafer, a man pretending to be a woman, says he renewed his passport and it came back with “Male” even though he checked off “Female.”

“F*** this administration!” pic.twitter.com/XdNZ77cO8x
— Libs of TikTok (@libsoftiktok) April 30, 2025
title: Trans actress from popular show freaks out that his passport came back as MALE: “We are never going to stop existing”

description:
A woman was assaulted by a male inmate in a California prison after a self-identified trans individual claimed to feel some type of way. During court, the judge ordered the victim to refer to her alleged attacker with “she/her” pronouns, despite everyone knowing the truth.

That is the reality many female inmates deal with, and it’s all in the name of progress. However, California Democrats cannot be bothered to even pretend to care, as they are beholden to being inclusive at the expense of being morally correct.

SB 337 was introduced </
title: Democrat senator DEFENDS putting men in women's prisons, thinks you're the "ridiculous" one for thinking otherwise

description:
The media has shown that it's not always committed to reporting the truth. Today’s show breaks down the three biggest and most recent anti-Trump lies coming from them.

According to the BBC, the Trump administration deported “three young children who are US citizens - including one with cancer,” to Honduras.

Donald Trump's border czar Tom Homan said the mothers had made the choice for their citizen children to be rem
title: Watch: Exposing 3 Major Anti-Trump LIES (What You Need to Look For)

description:
When a sleeping potato is the leader of the free world, you don’t tend to be as respected as you once were. That is why it was comical when ABC News' Terry Moran asked President Donald Trump if he thinks “the reputation in the United States has gone down under [his] presidency?” And given that ABC contributed to one of the biggest cover-ups in American history, despite now claiming ignorance, it’s even more pathetic that they want to label the Trump presidency as the laughing stock.

Look, if I knew, and you knew, and I knew that you knew — then there’s zero chance Moran didn’t know. So, for the media apparatus to now claim ignorance is exactly why they’ve become as irrelevant as they are.

NEW: President Trump calls out ABC News on ABC News to ABC News' Terry Moran'
title: "You're fake news": ABC News' Terry Moran tried coming after Donald Trump... it didn't work out for him. Like, at all!

description:
Some things happened at a Beyonce concert. Nike, famous for Air Jordans and child labor, has a new slogan they revealed at the London Marathon. President Donald Trump gave a speech commemorating his (second) first 100 days in office in Michigan. It went pretty well. Here are the highlights.

NIKE’S NEW SLOGAN

  • "NEVER AGAIN. UNTIL NEXT YEAR.”
title: Sources: Exposing 3 Major Anti-Trump LIES - What You Need to Look For

description:
Once voters realize their preferred political party hates them and sucks at life, they tend to look outside politics. Conservatives did that when they turned to a successful businessman and real estate developer to Make America Great Again. Democrats find themselves lost in the wilderness after the People Who Controlled Joe Biden let them down and are looking outside of politics to be led by a social media influencer: Rep. AOC.

She is in the midst of a tour where she is flown around on private jets to fight the oligarchy. As of this writing, it is unclear if it is the same oligarchy that funds the Democrat Party through NGOs and nonprofits and who were the people behind the People Who Controlled
title: While presidential candidate Rep. AOC denies being one, a GOP senator savages her with animal metaphors

description:
If you hate Scott Jennings for being the lone voice of reason on CNN before, you're really gonna hate him after he shared the stage with Donald Trump at his Michigan rally. Yes, CNN, to their --- I guess "credit" -- sent the one person who doesn't hate Donald Trump to cover a Trump rally. And if that doesn't trigger the left and his CNN colleagues (but I repeat myself) enough, the ice bucket challenge he played dumping cold water on Trump's "bad" polling will.

To be clear, Jennings wasn't a scheduled guest at Trump's rally. He wasn't supposed to speak. But Trump is Trump, and he likes calling people on stage with him.

It hurts my heart to say this, but Whitmer is disqualifying herself at this point.
WHAT IS SHE DOING??????
title: Scott Jennings has Trump rally crowd laughing, but what he says about Trump's "bad" polling will truly trigger CNN and Dems
